string.name: appName
string.comment: This text will be shown in the android devices app drawer as the apps name

string.name: optionsUseDarkThemeText
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menu as description for the theme switch

string.name: optionsTitleBarText
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menus titlebar

string.name: optionsLatestReleaseText
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menu as the link to the lastest release

string.name: optionsListOrderText
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menu as description of the dropdown for sorting the shopping list

string.name: optionsUnorderedOrdering
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menus ordering dropdown menu; represents no ordering

string.name: optionsAlphabeticalOrdering
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menus ordering dropdown menu; represents alphabetical ordering

string.name: optionsAmountAscendingOrdering
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menus ordering dropdown menu; represents ascending ordering by amount

string.name: optionsAmountDecendingOrdering
string.comment: This text will be shown in the options menus ordering dropdown menu; represents descending ordering by amount

string.name: mainMenuOptionsLinkText
string.comment: This text will be shown as the text to open the options menu; It is used for accessability (e.g. blind people)

string.name: mainListIsEmptyText
string.comment: This text will be shown in case the shopping list does not contain any elements

string.name: mainSubtractButtonDescription
string.comment: This text describes the minus button for an item of the shopping list; It is used for accessability (e.g. blind people)

resources.string: Decreases the items amount by one

string.name: mainAddButtonDescription
string.comment: This text describes the plus button for an item of the shopping list; It is used for accessability (e.g. blind people)

resources.string: Increases the items amount by one

string.name: mainDeleteButtonDescription
string.comment: This text describes the trash can button for an item of the shopping list; It is used for accessability (e.g. blind people)

resources.string: Deletes the item from the shopping list

string.name: mainFloatingAddButtonDescription
string.comment: This text describes the floating plus button that adds a new item to the shopping list. It is used for accessability (e.g. blind people)

resources.string: Adds a new item to the shopping list

string.name: addSaveButtonText
string.comment: This text will be shown on top of the save-button when adding a new item

string.name: addNameHint
string.comment: This text will be shown as a placeholder for the items name when adding a new one

string.name: addAmountHint
string.comment: This text will be shown as a placeholder for the items amount when adding a new one

string.name: addTitleBarText
string.comment: This text will be shown in the titlebar when adding a new item

string.name: addNameIsEmptyMessage
string.comment: This text will be shown if a user enters an empty item name for a new item

resources.string: The name must not be empty

string.name: addAmountNotANumberMessage
string.comment: This text will be shown if a user manages to enter a non-numeric text for the amount of a new item

resources.string: The amount must be a valid number

string.name: addAmountTooSmallMessage
string.comment: This text will be shown if a user enters a negative amount when adding an item

resources.string: The amount must be higher than 0

string.name: addItemAlreadyExistsMessage
string.comment: This text will be shown if a user tries to add the same item multiple times

resources.string: An item with this name already exists

string.name: addShareButtonText
string.comment: This text will be shown on the share-button when adding a new item

string.name: addShareText
string.comment: This text will be sent to your contact when sharing a new item with them

resources.string: Please add an item to your shopping list: %1$s
